description: A ColumnDropperByName is a converter which drops columns from a dataset by an name, or a list of names.
error_msg: The parameters for ColumnDropperByName should include 'column_names'.

oneOf.description: The name of the single column to drop.
oneOf.error_msg: The column name should be a string representing the name of the column to be dropped.

column_names.error_msg: The column_names parameter should be either a string or a list of strings representing the names of the columns to be dropped.
